articles.title: College Football World Reacts to Army-Navy Total Going Over in OT - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: For the first time in 17 years, the over hit in the Army-Navy point total.
articles.content:
For the first time in 17 years, the betting total in the Army-Navy game has gone over.
All it took was a 10–10 game at the end of regulation going to double overtime to make it happen. Ultimately, A… [+511 chars]
